reviewText: I loved it  just one thing wrong with it didn't have a lot of tush in it but would love another one.
Buy it! Wasn't entertaining as girls gone wild DVD! Wasn't. What I expected.. it's a must not buy! Oh well:(

I like some of these "Wild Party Girls" DVDs quite a lot, but others mess with the image too much for my taste. "Hotties Uncensored" is one that messes with the image TOO much for me. I mean, stuff like discoloration, switching to black-and-white and back to color, jittery image, multiple images, overexposure, and so on, and they often do that right when some woman is taking her shirt off. There's some really great-looking and charismatic ladies here, so this DVD is still fun to see, but it's sometimes frustrating. The run time of this is 57 minutes. The image is usually widescreen, but sometimes full screen, multiple images, etc. The sound is sometimes live and sometimes rock or rap music. The only bonus is a 2.5-minute slide show that's quite good. There's one woman who is a particularly great find since she's both totally beautiful and also has a great personality. Oddly, even though she gets totally naked a bit, the camera obviously avoids showing her below the stomach, although the title of the DVD is "Hotties UNcensored"!! And there are 1 or 2 other cases like that. So there's no full-frontal nudity on here. And there's a funny scene where a girl is dancing at a club, wearing a shirt that dips way down on one side, and at one point while she's dancing, one of her breasts slips out. She acts shocked, but then she starts doing that deliberately over and over. Usually you can get a good look at her, but sometimes the editors mess with the image. And several ladies on here are stacked, some bodaciously stacked! Speaking of which, the last segment is a wet t-shirt contest where 3 of the 4 ladies in it are stacked! They get topless much of the time, and thankfully the image is not much messed up on this segment. So there's some very good stuff on here despite the overzealous editors. Thus, while you might want to see the bodacious babes on here, there are other "Wild Party Girls" DVDs that are better. My favorites are Wild Party Girls: Summer Madness Tour, while another great one is Wild Party Girls: Naked Boat Bash, and last but not least Wild Party Girls: Naked Spring Break.
